sentences.sentence: He was advised to spend time in the warmth and dryness of Italy.
sentences.translation: 他被建议在意大利的温暖和干燥中过些日子。

sentences.sentence: Dryness of the skin can also be caused by living in centrally heated homes and offices.
sentences.translation: 皮肤干燥还会因呆在有中央供暖的居室或办公室而引起。

sentences.sentence: With so much dryness, so many communities to catch fire, so many fronts to fight, it becomes an almost incredible job.
sentences.translation: 干燥度如此之高，加上许多社区着火，有这么多前线要去战斗，这几乎成了一项不可思议的工作。
